00011 #pragma once
00012 #ifndef __X2D_INTERPOLATOR_H__
00013 #define __X2D_INTERPOLATOR_H__
00014 
00015 #include "math_util.h"
00016 
00017 namespace x2d {
00018 namespace util {
00019 
00020     class time_interpolator
00021     {
00022     public:
00023         time_interpolator(float t)
00024         : total_time_(t)
00025         , elapsed_time_(0.0f)
00026         {
00027         }
00028         
00029         virtual ~time_interpolator()
00030         {        
00031         }
00032         
00033         virtual void update(float dt)
00034         {
00035             elapsed_time_ += dt;
00036             
00037             if(elapsed_time_ > total_time_)
00038                 reset();
00039             
00040             calculate();
00041         }
00042         
00043         virtual void reset()
00044         {
00045             elapsed_time_ = 0.0f;
00046         }
00047         
00048         virtual void calculate() = 0;
00049         
00050     protected:
00051         float total_time_;
00052         float elapsed_time_;
00053     };
00054 
00058     class linear_interpolator
00059     : public time_interpolator
00060     {
00061     public:
00062         linear_interpolator(float& v, float min, float max, float t)
00063         : time_interpolator(t)
00064         , val_(v)
00065         , min_(min)
00066         , max_(max)
00067         {
00068         }
00069         
00070         virtual void calculate()
00071         {        
00072             float b = clamp( elapsed_time_ / total_time_, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00073             val_ = min_ * (1.0f - b) + max_ * b;
00074         }
00075 
00076     private:
00077         float & val_;
00078         float min_, max_;
00079     };
00080 
00084     class quadratic_interpolator
00085     : public time_interpolator
00086     {
00087     public:
00088         quadratic_interpolator(float& v, float min, float mid, float max, float t)
00089         : time_interpolator(t)
00090         , val_(v)
00091         , min_(min)
00092         , mid_(mid)
00093         , max_(max)
00094         {
00095         }
00096         
00097         virtual void calculate()
00098         {        
00099             float b = clamp( elapsed_time_ / total_time_, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00100             float a = 1.0f - b;
00101             val_ = min_*a*a + mid_*2*a*b + max_*b*b;
00102         }
00103         
00104     private:
00105         float & val_;
00106         float min_, mid_, max_;
00107     };
00108   
00112     class cubic_interpolator
00113     : public time_interpolator
00114     {
00115     public:
00116         cubic_interpolator(float& v, float min, 
00117                                float mid1, float mid2, 
00118                                float max, float t)
00119         : time_interpolator(t)
00120         , val_(v)
00121         , min_(min)
00122         , mid1_(mid1)
00123         , mid2_(mid2)
00124         , max_(max)
00125         {
00126         }
00127         
00128         virtual void calculate()
00129         {        
00130             float b = clamp( elapsed_time_ / total_time_, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00131             float a = 1.0f - b;
00132             val_ = min_*a*a*a + mid1_*3*a*a*b + mid2_*3*a*b*b + max_*b*b*b;
00133         }
00134         
00135     private:
00136         float & val_;
00137         float min_, mid1_, mid2_, max_;
00138     };
00139     
00140 } // namespace util
00141 } // namespace x2d
